title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 13 - Rules Governing The Provision Of Service By Gas, Electric And Steam Corporations To Nonresidential Customers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 13 - Rules Governing The Provision Of Service By Gas, Electric And Steam Corporations To Nonresidential Customers

State Regulations
§ 13.1 - Applicability of rules and definitions
§ 13.2 - Applications for service
§ 13.3 - Termination of service
§ 13.4 - Reconnection of service
§ 13.5 - Deferred payment agreements
§ 13.6 - Levelized payment plans
§ 13.7 - Security deposits
§ 13.8 - Meter reading and estimated bills
§ 13.9 - Backbilling
§ 13.10 - Late payment and other charges
§ 13.11 - Contents of bills
§ 13.12 - Notice requirements
§ 13.13 - Disconnection without notice
§ 13.14 - Inspection and examination of utility apparatus
§ 13.15 - Complaint-handling procedures
§ 13.16 - Severability

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 13

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§4, 66, 72, 80, 85

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
